thread.title: GOP Moves To Defund Planned Parenthood As Part Of Obamacare Repeal
thread.title_full: GOP Moves To Defund Planned Parenthood As Part Of Obamacare Repeal

author: Andrew Kerr
title: GOP Moves To Defund Planned Parenthood As Part Of Obamacare Repeal
text:
GOP Moves To Defund Planned Parenthood As Part Of Obamacare Repeal "We won’t back down ..." by Andrew Kerr January 5, 2017 at 12:24pm Share on Facebook Share Tweet Email Email Print Advertisement - story continues below 
House Speaker Paul Ryan said Thursday that the bill to repeal Obamacare will include a provision to defund Planned Parenthood. 
Ryan said legislation to defund Planned Parenthood would be included in the “reconciliation” bill — a process that prevents Democrats from filibustering the measure. 
This means Republicans will only need a simple majority of 51 votes to defund the organization. Advertisement - story continues below 
Planned Parenthood receives $500 million in federal assistance every year, and provides reproductive health care to women, including abortions. 
Ryan’s comments Thursday align with campaign promises made by President-elect Donald Trump to defund Planned Parenthood. 
In a letter to pro-life leaders in September, Trump committed to “defunding Planned Parenthood as long as they continue to perform abortions.” Advertisement - story continues below 
Trump promised to “reallocate their funding to community health centers that provide comprehensive health care for women.” 
Supporters of Planned Parenthood are expected put up an aggressive fight against GOP efforts to defund the organization. 
“We won’t back down, we won’t be silenced, and we will not let these politicians attack our health and rights without a fight,” Kelly Robinson, deputy national organizing director for Planned Parenthood, said in a statement. 
The president of Planned Parenthood, Cecile Richards, said the “crusade” by Republicans against the organization is a “serious threat” to reproductive and LGBT rights. Advertisement - story continues below
